name: Jam Ball 3D
description:
Let’s enjoy various music genres which suit different music tastes including smooth touch of elegance from piano and fantastic beat.

Gameplay and features:
1. Hold and drag to keep the bouncing ball on the music tiles .
2. Don not miss any pop of your bouncy ball .
3. Wonderful background music in line with beautiful theme for you .
4. we love you ! If you feel nice, please share our game with your friends .
